skillRequirements.extra: to wield a mirror shield to kill a basilisk
Note: Lokar will not talk to you if you do not have all of the required non-boostable stats.

Note: The level 26 Agility requirement to begin the quest is boostable, but the unboostable obstacles within Meiyerditch only require 25 Agility. Therefore, 25 Agility is the lowest level possible to complete the quest.
